content.rendered:
latest

Member Exclusive

Dinner Bed and Breakfast
Fully flexible rate includes breakfast and three course dinner from set menu or buffet in a designated hotel restaurant for one or two resident adults sharing a room.
Package includes
  • Daily WiFi in room and public areas
  • Access to 24-hour Fitness Center
  • Access to 24-hours Business Center
  • Guided neighborhood walking tours
